text: Gerald William "Jerry" Trainor (born January 21, 1977) is an American actor, comedian and voice actor. He has appeared in series like T.U.F.F. Puppy. He is best known as Spencer Shay in iCarly. Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from San Diego Category:Actors from San Diego Category:American Internet celebrities
title: Jerry Trainor
